 
There are N students which are going to participate in Code Golf which is one of the mega event of Technovation. Everything was going smoothly but problem arises when students came to know about it that it is a team event, so students have to make a team.
Procedure of making team:

A team can have any number of member upto N.
If A choose B as his/her team member or B select A as his/her team member then they are of same team. 

 

Input

The first line of the input contains an integer N denoting the number of participants.
N lines follows two integer A, B denoting A select B as his team member.

 

Output

You have to print K number of Team formed
K seperated integer denoting number of team members in team in non decreasing order.

 

Constraints

1 ≤ N≤ 1000

 

Example
Input:
51 22 13 44 35 1
Output:
22 3 

Explanation
Example case 1. The first team consist of {1,2,5} and second team {3,4}
